name: leaping stripes and blocks blanket
notes:
the leaping stripes and blocks blankets that i made up are preemie sized, to fit our new arrivals - about 20 x 20. this is also the perfect size for adding an amigurumi head to make a sweet crochet lovey! if you like the pattern but want it bigger, i've included sizing information for making a standard baby blanket, afghan, twin, queen size, and kind/cal king blanket as well! so be sure to check the sizing info for the specifics, and then follow the generalized instructions. i've included a photo tutorial that starts with a chain of just 18 but it's enough to show how the stitch pattern comes together.
  
update 9/1/13: danske pdf added! (blog only)
update 1/1/14: nederlands pdf added! (blog only)
  
this pattern is free on my blog, or you can purchase the english language ad-free pdf! 

 this pattern is free on my blog, or you can purchase the english language ad-free pdf here!

the leaping stripes and blocks blankets that i made up are preemie sized, to fit our new arrivals – about 20″ x 20″. this is also the perfect size for adding an amigurumi head to make a sweet crochet lovie! if you like the pattern but want it bigger, i’ve included sizing information for making a standard baby blanket, afghan, twin, queen size, and kind/cal king blanket as well! so be sure to check the sizing info for the specifics, and then follow the generalized instructions. i’ve included a photo tutorial that starts with a chain of just 18 – but it’s enough to show how the stitch pattern comes together.

update 7/31/13: video tutorial now available at https://www.mooglyblog.com/leaping-stripes-blocks-blanket-tutorial/
